articles.description: On the back of a title win at the Canada Open 2023, Lakshya Sen climbed seven places to be ranked world number 12 in the latest BWF rankings on Tuesday.
articles.content: Indian ace shuttler Lakshya Sen jumped ahead by seven spots to become the world number 12 in mens singles in the latest BWF (Badminton World Federation) World Rankings released on July 11 (Tuesday). … [+1974 chars]

articles.title: I cancelled Aussie players' holiday during the Ashes when we lost in 2019 – it was unpopular but it worked - The Telegraph
articles.description: That week between Headingley and retaining the Ashes at Old Trafford was the best coaching week of my career
articles.content: Five weeks later battered, bruised, defeated, deflated, the flight home felt like a relief. Such was the pressure of the contest, that series felt like running a marathon into a strong headwind. I am… [+2719 chars]
